short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Simple, fast and secure extention to save bookmarks

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Clipory is a fast, simple, and secure Chrome extension that allows you to efficiently manage your bookmarks directly in your browser. No complicated settings or features — just add and search your bookmarks with maximum convenience. Everything happens on the client side, and your data remains private: no data transmission to servers, no information collection.

With Clipory, you get simplicity and cleanliness without compromising functionality. Add, sort, and find your bookmarks in a single tap. Fast, convenient, and secure!

Now, Clipory is even smarter! Thanks to the new AI algorithm, your extension automatically generates a brief summary for each bookmark by simply analyzing the URL. This feature helps you quickly understand the content of the page without opening it. No need to manually write descriptions — Clipory will do it for you, offering even more convenience and speed!
